DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , national , multicenter , non-interventional study examine use triple combination therapy boceprevir , pegylated interferon ( peginterferon ) alfa-2a ribavirin re-treating participant genotype 1 chronic hepatitis C ( CHC ) infection . Dosing treatment duration discretion investigator accordance local clinical practice local labeling . Participants observe duration triple combination therapy 24 week thereafter .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Examining Use Triple Combination Therapy With Boceprevir , Peginterferon Alfa-2a Ribavirin Re-Treatment Chronic Hepatitis C Patients
